title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 351.13 - Isolation on returning home
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 351.13 - Isolation on returning home

State Regulations

The owner or custodian shall keep show animals biologically
separate from the herd or flock for a period of at least two weeks after
returning to the premise of origin. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
351.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
